name: Hotung Investment Holdings
overview: Hotung Investment Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the venture capital investment business. It also involves in the trading and underwriting of securities and provision of securities management and consulting services. The company invests primarily in the companies operating in optoelectronics, wireless communications, video and audio-related products, broadband network transmission and reception equipment, data storage, integrated circuit design, digital content, and telematics industries. It operates primarily in Taiwan, the United States, and other countries. Hotung Investment Holdings, formerly known as Hotung Venture Capital Corp., was founded by Cheng-Wang Huang in 1987. The company is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
